longinst: Now, you will try to learn several words that you will be asked to remember later.  You will see the words a total of three times, to help you remember them as well as you can. When you see a word, say it aloud and try to remember it. In this phase, you will only learn the words. Later, we will test you on your memory.  Press the mouse button to begin the learning phase.
inst1: Repeat and try to remember each word.
inst2: Click mouse button when ready to begin.
inst2b: Click mouse button for a second round
inst1c: Try to guess the word based on the first two letters
longinst2: Next, you will be asked to remember the words you learned earlier.  To test your memory, you will be shown pairs of words. For each pair, you learned only one of the words.  Select the word you learned by clicking on it.  Click the mouse button to begin.
testinst1: Which word did you learn earlier?.
